text:
The glue that holds our wing together! The last road journey with you was something else. Baaki sab memoir toh ho hi gaye the campus mei, accha laga tha phirse tum waapas aa gaye the!
Badiya hai bhai, apna usual kaam chaapne kar karte ho!
author: Utkarsh

text: Bhai! tumse introduction Buchas se mainly hua tha, phir tumhaare 1st year ke room mei shift ho gaye. Phir bhai second year tera E-Wing mei aana jaana rha toh aur maza aagaya. Kaafi chill maarte ho, aur doosro ko bhi karate ho! ðŸ¤£ Lucknow trip toh alag hi fun thi bhai! Wo pizza nights, random stories mei bahut maza aata tha! Abhi jab indore aaye the we tried to meet you but nahi bann paaya. Koi nahi, jaisa bola trip toh honi hai ðŸ˜…, saath mei chalna! All the best!
author: Utkarsh

text:
The funny guy from Hall-12, same dept one and who laughs out loud when someone trips over. :-P
Hey man, all the best! Enjoy the rest of the times.
author: Utkarsh

text: Bhai! Apne Memoir toh uss hi time ho gaye the toh idhar kuch bacha nahi hai zyaada! ðŸ˜‚ But bhai ek dum sir hi hai aap _/\_. Bhaut levels par connect hue campus mei. I really had some good discussions with you, which I am glad that connect continually got transformed! Bete Mauj kara di lol! Stay safe and be happy! Long way to go for us.
author: Utkarsh

text: Well, we had connected from quizzing, toh 1st year mei wahan se jaana. Baaki phir branch change bhi same dept mei ho gayi. The random popping up of "That's what she said" aur deo sir ki class mei hasi control karte rhena, lol bhai kya hi tha. TA ke project mei group alag se banawaya phir bhi, kya hi bana diya tha end mei lol :-P. Your goals are really refined and work really hard for that and that's something I learnt from. All the best man, have the best of the times ahead! ~ Utkarsh
author: Utkarsh
